cards.question: Why is the sky blue? What physical phenomenon makes the sky blue?
options: Rayleigh scattering, dispersion of electromagnetic radiation by particles that have a radius less than approximately 1/10 the wavelength of the radiation.
The ability of ozone to absorb the UV solar radiation with a wavelength of 220 to 300 nm.
The spectral albedo of the oceans and from plants are both less for shorter wavelengths.

cards.question: Chlorosis is a condition in which leaves produce insufficient chlorophyll. What are common causes chlorosis in plants?
options: A specific mineral deficiency in the soil, such as iron, magnesium or zinc.
A soil pH at which minerals become unavailable for absorption by the roots.
